name: Study Breaks
description:
(Works on tablets and phones too)

Study Break 📚

Warioware like, play 6 mini games before the big exam, and help Sucre and her cute dog along the way.

Sucre really needs to work for her exam, but she keeps delaying to study... Sometimes it's hard to do what you're suppose to do. And if Sucre needs to sort her laundry and play video games to destress so be it.

(please ignore all the typos, it was very late when i wrote everything)

📚📚📚

Made for the Ludum Dare 50 (compo) with the theme Delay the inevitable. It was my first Ludum Dare, and first 48h game jam, and omg what a run!

I used the palette from Mushfairy 

Thanks Ruca, Lea, and Johan for the advices
